brief_details.what: Asit tankından sızıntı oldu, iki çalışan kimyasal yanıklarla acil servise kaldırıldı.

part3_rca.incident_summary: What happened: Asit tankından sızıntı oldu, iki çalışan kimyasal yanıklarla acil servise kaldırıldı.. Who: [{'name': 'Ayşe Kaya', 'age': 35}, {'name': 'Fatma Öztürk', 'age': 29}]. Where: İzmir Aliağa'daki kimya fabrikası. Event type: Accident. Severity: 2. "Serious"

five_why_chains.description: Chemical leak due to equipment failure

whys.question: Why was there a chemical leak?
whys.answer: The tank was not properly maintained.

whys.question: Why was the tank not properly maintained?
Why were maintenance schedules not followed?
whys.answer: There was a lack of accountability for maintenance tasks.

whys.question: Why was there a lack of accountability?
whys.answer: The maintenance management system was inadequate.

five_why_chains.root_cause: The maintenance management system was inadequate.

whys.question: Why did they suffer chemical burns?
whys.answer: They were exposed to the chemical leak.

whys.question: Why were they exposed to the chemical leak?
whys.answer: They did not know the proper safety protocols.

whys.question: Why did they not know the proper safety protocols?
Why was safety training insufficient?
whys.answer: There was no regular training program in place.

five_why_chains.root_cause: There was no regular training program in place.

whys.question: Why did the incident occur?
whys.answer: Emergency services were needed for the injured employees.

whys.question: Why were they seriously injured?
whys.answer: There were no immediate emergency response procedures.

whys.question: Why were there no immediate emergency response procedures?
whys.answer: Emergency response plans were not developed or communicated.

whys.question: Why were emergency response plans not developed?
whys.answer: The organization did not prioritize safety planning.

five_why_chains.root_cause: The organization did not prioritize safety planning.

immediate_causes.description: There was a chemical leak from the tank.
Employees were exposed to the chemical leak, leading to burns.

underlying_causes.description: The tank was not properly maintained, leading to the leak.
Employees did not know the proper safety protocols due to lack of training.
There were no immediate emergency response procedures in place for the incident.

root_causes.description: The maintenance management system was inadequate, leading to poor maintenance practices.
There was no regular training program in place for safety protocols.
The organization did not prioritize safety planning, resulting in unpreparedness for emergencies.
